name: Indian Institute of Management Kozhikode
description: The Institute was set up by the Government of India, in collaboration with the State Government of Kerala, as the 5th Indian Institute of Management. It aims to emerge as an internationally reckoned management centre with the motto of 'Globalizing Indian Thought.' It conducts an array of academic activities involving research, teaching, training, consulting, and intellectual infrastructure development to help improve the management systems globally. It emphasizes the development of analytical skills while gracefully balancing global and cross-cultural issues to mold business leaders into assets for society and maintain the equilibrium between business and social concerns. It strives to inculcate perspective building, teamwork, co-operation, and harmony among its stakeholders.

ShortDescription: The Indian Institute of Management Kozhikode (IIMK) is a premier Business School which has earned a reputation for excellence in academic activities and industry interactions.

Highlights.name: Prestigious Business School with Renowned Programs
Highlights.description: IIM Kozhikode is a prestigious business school . This means that it is a well-respected institution with a strong reputation for academic excellence. The school offers a variety of programs, including doctoral programs, postgraduate programs, and executive programs [1]. Some of the specific programs are PGP, PGP-Finance, PGP-LSM, PGP-BL, PhD in Management, Executive Post Graduate Programme, and Management Development Programme.

Highlights.name: World-Class Infrastructure in Scenic Location
Highlights.description: The Indian Institute of Management Kozhikode (IIMK) campus is located on two hillocks in Kerala, India. The campus is known for its scenic beauty and world-class infrastructure . This means that students have access to state-of-the-art facilities in a beautiful and inspiring setting.

Highlights.name: Diverse Academic Programs for Higher Education
Highlights.description: IIM Kozhikode offers a variety of academic programs for higher education . These programs cover a wide range of business disciplines, including finance, marketing, human resources, and operations management. This means that students can find a program that meets their specific interests and career goals.

enhanced_description: The Indian Institute of Management Kozhikode (IIMK), established in 1996 by the Government of India in collaboration with the State Government of Kerala, is a premier and internationally recognized business school. Operating with the motto 'Globalizing Indian Thought,' IIMK engages in extensive academic activities including research, teaching, training, consulting, and intellectual infrastructure development, all aimed at improving global management systems. It offers a diverse range of prestigious academic programs for higher education, encompassing doctoral programs (PhD in Management), postgraduate programs (PGP, PGP-Finance, PGP-LSM, PGP-BL), and executive programs (Executive Post Graduate Programme, Management Development Programme). These programs cover a wide array of business disciplines such as Strategy & Marketing, Finance, Leadership & Management, Education & Operations, and Human Resources. The institute emphasizes developing analytical skills while gracefully balancing global and cross-cultural issues, with a focus on molding business leaders to be assets for society and fostering equilibrium between business and social concerns. IIMK also strives to inculcate perspective building, teamwork, co-operation, and harmony among its stakeholders, and explicitly works towards building a more diverse and inclusive workforce. The institute's campus in Kozhikode, Kerala, is noted for its scenic beauty and world-class infrastructure.
